description:
Want to set it and forget it? Then the Kryptotal is your tire. The Jack of all trades of the Continental MTB tire line, the Kryptotal bites into almost any terrain, so you can slice through loam one day, and hammer through rock gardens the next. This tire’s versatility comes from balancing stability, traction, and rolling resistance; so, you can feel good on the weekly group ride and at the park.

  • Trail casing uses 60 TPI material: 3-layers on the centerline and 2 layers on the sides, with and added layer of fabric for puncture protection
  • Endurance rubber focuses on traction and endurance, making it hard-wearing and grippy
  • Deep lugs clear muck and loam with ease
  • Large sidewall lugs bite into corners so you can rail berms
  • Optimized for front or rear, so be sure choose the right one. The front tire is nimble and has impressive control under braking. The rear tire delivers excellent power transfer and braking performance
name: Continental Kryptotal 27.5 x 2.40in. F Trail Endurance Folding Tire
